title: “Enhancement Techniques for Lagrangian Cut”
description: Exhibited the properties of Lagrangian cuts and showed how to enhance Lagrangian cuts.

title: “Multistage Stochastic Program for Mitigating Power System Risks under Wildfire Disruptions”
description: I chaired a session on "Optimization under Uncertainty in Power Systems" at the conference. For details of the presentation, please see the [slides](https://github.com/YANG-Hanbin/YANG-Hanbin.github.io/blob/master/files/wildfire_presentation.pdf).

title: “Multistage Stochastic Program for Mitigating Power System Risks under Wildfire Disruptions”

title: “Stochastic Cutting-plane Dynamic integer Programming”
description: A new work about using disjunctive cuts to tighten Benders' cuts.

title: “Globally Converging Algorithm for Multistage Stochastic Mixed-Integer Programs via Enhanced Lagrangian Cuts”
description: A globally converging algorithm for MS-MIP.
